resources.string: The Book has been developed by Neeraj Kr Chaudhary in it\'s Android App Development Training program.This app uses Kotlin to build its functionality. The concepts covered this app constitutes of: Layouts using XML Kotlin Basics Activity Lifecycle Intents Fragments and their lifecycle lists using Recycler View Connecting the app to the Internet GET and POST Request using Volley Saving and Retrieving data in SQL using Room in Android, doing all these things once alone is not enough. In order to have a good understanding, you need to continuously practice all these by building simple apps. Apart from this, there is a huge world of Android where there is a lot more to explore. We hope that this app gave you the kickstart you needed in the technology and we wish you all the best
